name: .LM
summary: Learn about .LM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: LM files are Windows system files and are not meant to be opened. If you want to enable predictive text within Windows, open the Start Menu and select Settings → Devices → Typing. Then, toggle the settings that start with Show text suggestions ... and Show text predictions ... to On.
